title: Finding Your Om: Travel Wellness + Mindfulness
description: Traveling can always come with a few challenges, whether it’s a delayed flight or botched reservation, your vacation shouldn't be ruined because of a bump in the road. Nisreene is joined by Neurologist David Strayer, who shares advice on staying grounded during your travel, paying attention to your mental health, and some tricks on how to re-center and find peace in each experience.
itunes:subtitle: Nisreene is joined by Neurologist David Strayer, who shares advice on staying grounded during your travel, paying attention to your mental health, and some tricks on how to re-center and find peace in each experience.
author: Podcast@expedia.com (Expedia)
